entry.dcterms:description: 1) party preferences, popularity of politicians, evaluation of the work of the government and opposition, satisfaction with democracy 2) subjective financial situation, the economic situation of Hungary now and in the next year; evaluation of the governments since the regime change, the situation of the different social strata in 2000; opinions about the 2-year budget 3) reputation of, and opinion about, the activities of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, the Immigration and Citizenship Bureau, the Public Administration Bureau, and the Document Offices; opinions about the work of the police, fire authority, and border guards; opinions about the prevalence of prostitution, and its regulation; public opinion about the prevalence of car thefts, burglaries, and forcing back crime 4) Survival chances of enterprises in Hungary: the second wave of the survey starting in December 2000, in a separate questionnaire: economic participation, participation in the second economy, enterpreneurial activities, discontinuing and restarting enterprises from the seventies up till now
